name: Kalorama Group
tag_list: ipv4, ipv6, transaction-advisory, ipv4-broker, consultant, buy-ipv4, sell-ipv4
overview:
Kalorama is an IP advisory boutique, consulting companies on both their IPv4 transactions and their transition to IPv6.

Kalorama provides a transparent marketplace for IPv4 space to ease transition to IPv6 for businesses and hence expedite the global transition. Kalorama seeks to be an expert and the place for businesses to turn to regarding knowledge about transfers and transfer policy. We aim to make the transfer of IPv4 address space as straightforward and transparent as possible.

Kalorama represents businesses in the global transition to IPv6. We are sensitive to the unique challenges and requirements businesses face and work our hardest to accommodate them. We strive to be the thought leader in the field and push for more progressive transfer policies to make the transfer process more business-friendly.
